TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AddInBaseAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class AddInBaseAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class AddInBaseAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 将对象标识为管线的外接程序视图段。

span.span: Identifies an object as an add-in view segment of the pipeline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和方法用于维护有关可用管道段的信息的存储区, 可使用此特性来标识外接程序视图。The and methods, which maintain the store of information about available pipeline segments, use this attribute to identify an add-in view. 若要构造管道, 外接程序从其继承的外接程序视图中的类型由属性标识, 称为外接程序基。To construct the pipeline, the type in the add-in view that the add-in inherits from is identified by the attribute and is called the add-in base. 此属性应仅用于激活管线段的类型。This attribute should be used only on types that activate the segments of the pipeline. 表示在宿主和外接程序之间传递的对象的类型不需要此属性。Types that represent objects passed between the host and the add-in do not need this attribute. ## Examples 下面的示例标识外接程序视图管道段的外接程序基类。The following example identifies the add-in base class for an add-in view pipeline segment. [!code-csharp[AddInP1AddInViews#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AddInP1AddInViews/cs/Calc1AddInView.cs#2)] [!code-vb[AddInP1AddInViews#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AddInP1AddInViews/vb/Calc1AddInView.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置单个外接程序端适配器可用于构造管线的一个或多个外接程序基类型。

span.span: Gets or sets one or more add-in base types that a single add-in-side adapter can use to construct the pipeline.

value.span: 一个外接程序基类型数组。

span.span: An array of add-in base types.
